actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution urging the President to take certain actions with respect to ongoing negotiations to conclude an agreement between the United States and Canada concerning air quality.

summary.text: Urges the President to report to Congress on the progress of negotiations entered into with Canada for a cooperative agreement concerning air quality and the prospects for concluding such an agreement. Urges the President to include in such an agreement a provision, in the case of unresolved disputes, for binding arbitration or giving citizens of each nation equal access to the remedies of both nations.

titles.title: A resolution urging the President to take certain actions with respect to ongoing negotiations to conclude an agreement between the United States and Canada concerning air quality.
